response.original_title: Brothers Broken: The Story That Stopped the Music
response.overview: The saga of two brothers who form a well known band in the late 60s, only to abandon it at the height of the band's popularity to join a hardcore cult. This compelling story details the next fifty years of their lives, the devastating impact of the cult, and their always unpredictable, often volatile, frequently shocking, and ultimately heartwarming relationship with each other.
response.title: Brothers Broken: The Story That Stopped the Music
